title: Drawing, "Suicide of Marcus Porcius Cato", late 19th century
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Cato kills himself with his sword, lying upon his bed. Mourning crowd enters his room.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Suicide of Marcus Porcius Cato", late 19th century.
